item.description:
I will be heading to Elephant & Castle to revisit the granddaddy of Boston pub trivia. The prizes are always stellar. Matter of fact last time we were here one of the prizes we won was a six pack of Stella Artois chalices/goblets and the other was a $50 gift card.

I will arrive at 6:00 PM. Get there when you can.

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink.

Don't be shy...Say hi.

Come out to enjoy friendly conversation with new and familiar folks before you head home or to the gym or to the library or to shop or wherever.

Michael, whose company MCO Productions, is the granddaddy of Boston pub trivia, begins testing for useless facts at 6:30. Fellow drinking buddy and Trivia King, Ray W. gives his seal of approval.

If you decide to eat, here's the Elephant & Castle menu.

Check out MBTA or HopStop to create your route by public transit. State Street (orange & blue lines), Government (green & blue lines) and Downtown Crossing (orange & red lines) subway stations are no more than a ten (10) minute walk.

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Find the Bruins flag and you will find us
item.name: Elephant & Castle Trivia Night Tuesday April 17th 6:00 PM
